body:
Ive been trying different editing softwares that arent really very reliable or free
Any ideas?
body_tagged:

title: Free Editing Sotftware for windows 10?

replies.body: I used Windows Movie Maker, that works
replies.body_tagged: I used Windows Movie Maker, that works

replies.body: If you are using Microsoft, I'd suggest you Premier Pro or Sony Vegas Pro.
replies.body_tagged: If you are using Microsoft, I'd suggest you Premier Pro or Sony Vegas Pro.

replies.body: Ok thanks for the suggestions ill try them out see which one works the best for me.
replies.body_tagged: Ok thanks for the suggestions ill try them out see which one works the best for me.

replies.body: Sony Vegas 13 is a good editing software, but you must know how to use it. Camtasia is pretty simple, and you don't need any tutorials on how to work it.
replies.body_tagged: Sony Vegas 13 is a good editing software, but you must know how to use it. Camtasia is pretty simple, and you don't need any tutorials on how to work it.
